channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Documents Show Biden Admin Ginned Up FBI Investigations Of Law-Abiding Political Opponents
item.description: Trump should immediately issue an executive order dismantling Biden's National Strategy for Countering Domestic Terrorism.

item.title: If NYC Elects A Far-Left Socialist, Blame Ranked-Choice Voting
item.description: New York City could sleepwalk its way into electing a socialist mayor, thanks to ranked-choice voting.

item.title: It’s Time For Trump To Play Hardball With Qatar
item.description: President Trump has the leverage over Qatar. He must use it to demand accountability and insist on transparency.

item.title: The Dollar: Gold Beating Green
item.description: The week of June 9, 2025: The retreat from the dollar, tariffs, the debt, defense tech, and much, much more.

item.title: Factories of Progress
item.description: Policies that hinder globalization and reduce trade are policies that decrease global prosperity and increase global poverty.

item.title: Texas identifies 33 potential noncitizen votes in 2024 election
item.description: Texas Attorney General Ken Paxton has opened investigations into 33 people he says voted in the 2024 election even though they may be noncitizens.

item.title: Feds Indict Georgia Man For Allegedly Threatening GOP Sens. Cruz, Fischer
item.description: A Georgia man was arraigned in federal court on Monday on charges related to allegedly making threats against two GOP senators and their families. Acc...

item.title: Senate Republicans seek tougher Medicaid cuts and lower SALT deduction in Trump's big bill
item.description: Senate Republicans on Monday proposed deeper Medicaid cuts, including new work requirements for parents of teens, as a way to offset the costs of maki...

item.title: Trump says U.S. knows where Iran's Khamenei is hiding, urges Iran's unconditional surrender
item.description: President Donald Trump says the U.S. knows where Iran's Supreme Leader Ayatollah Ali Khamenei is hiding but doesn't want him killed "for now."

item.title: Vance says to trust Trump after he appears to implicate U.S. directly in Israel-Iran conflict
item.description: Vice President J.D. Vance rushed to President Trump's defense amid concerns the U.S. is poised to take military action against Iran, saying the comman...

item.title: Report: Riot-Ravaged L.A. Paid Out $1.1 Billion In Overtime Hours Last Year
item.description: Five city employees last year made more than the $400,000 annual salary of the president of the United States, according to the OTB report.

item.title: Tulsi and Tucker Get Thrown Under the MAGA Bus
item.description: Their denial about the reality of Iran’s nuclear program has opened a rift with Trump.

item.title: Brad Lander, NYC comptroller and mayoral candidate, is arrested outside immigration court
item.description: New York City Comptroller and mayoral candidate Brad Lander was arrested by federal agents at an immigration court Tuesday as he was trying to "accomp...

item.title: Strong Workforce Enforcement Is the Key to Combating Illegal Immigration
item.description: We don’t have the wherewithal — neither the ICE agents nor the detention space — to effect a ‘mass deportation.’

item.title: The Point Is to End the Iran Nuclear Threat, Not to Secure a ‘Deal’
item.description: To negotiate when our strategic objective is within our grasp risks failing to achieve it.
